section.title: Maintenance mode not working on vCenter

formalpara.title: Symptom
formalpara.para: Host was placed in maintenance mode, but still appears live in vCenter.

formalpara.title: Cause
formalpara.para: The CloudPlatform administrator UI was used to place the host in scheduled maintenance mode. This mode is separate from vCenter's maintenance mode.

formalpara.title: Solution
formalpara.para: Use vCenter to place the host in maintenance mode.
